/.title: An RESTful API for LEETCODE Statistics

data: Welcome to the documentation for the LeetCode Stats RESTful API! This project aims to enhance the accessibility and ease of integration for developers using LeetCode data by converting the existing LeetCode API, which is based on GraphQL, into a RESTful API. The primary goal is to provide a straightforward way for developers to retrieve valuable statistics and information about LeetCode users and their problem-solving activities.
data.vision#Vision: The vision behind the LeetCode Stats RESTful API is to make it easier for developers to integrate LeetCode statistics into their projects. By providing a RESTful endpoint, developers can easily access and utilize the data without having to deal with the complexities of GraphQL.
data.problem-statement#Problem Statement: The LeetCode API primarily uses GraphQL for querying data. While GraphQL is powerful and flexible, it may not be the preferred choice for all developers.
